title: Game not starting, bad patch
body:
Hi Riot .. Well long story short. I started my computer, double clicked LoL (pinned to taskbar), Downloaded the " 11.8mb " file (the 1st time I logged since last night say 7 pm) ... So after the download, I had to double click my icon again, it's not starting. Restarted pc, shut off, started again... Nothing! 

"RiotClientServers" + "LeagueOfLegends" starts to run on taskmanager but for like 7 seconds!
My friends does the same! HELP! I wanna play!
Need pc specs?? Mecer w860cu, 4gb ram ddr3 , 1gb display, i5
PLEASE !! :'(

replies.body:
On top that... I can't move in game... 

SO YEAH... BAD PATCH
Awww wow okay so its an over all issue.. Aii.. wanna play so bad! thanks for the comment!
What version of Windows are you using? Out of curiosity... is it Windows 7?

Hey, sorry you experienced this issue. We're aware of the problem and we're working on a fix. Can you please reach out to Player Support if you haven't already?

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
